facebook.title: Right whales have distinctive voices
facebook.summary: Like humans, dolphins, and just a few other animals, North Atlantic right whales have distinctive voices! This discovery gives scientists a new tool for tracking the critically endangered whales, of which there are just 450 left in the world.
